main event: A civilian reported a silver colored object the size of a pea appearing to descend.
interesting points: The sighting occurred in San Margaret, California on 5 June 1955 at 0500/06z.,The object was described as resembling the nose of a pilot balloon.,The object appeared to be descending.,There was much balloon activity in the area at the time.,It is considered highly possible that the sighted object was a balloon.
sighted object: a silver colored object the size of a pea
